EmailTemplate.name: 6_1_Cold_Nurture_Client.6_1_Cold_Nurture_Client_Email_3
EmailTemplate.subject: Real-Time, All the Time
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/blog/on-turbonomic/reserved-instance-rightsizing-with-turbonomic-6-1/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Don’t get caught using legacy approaches and stale information when making decisions on your cloud and on-premises environment.
Turbonomic 6.1 ensures performance without sacrificing your cloud budgets. It drives the most effective use of both on-demand and Reserved Instance for cloud computing without compromising performance.
Please check out this blog post <[[https://turbonomic.com/blog/on-turbonomic/reserved-instance-rightsizing-with-turbonomic-6-1/]]> to learn more about Turbonomic 6.1's new capabilities for Reserved Instances on the public cloud.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
